name: timesync
description: TimeSync time tracker implemented in js

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=mocha_sqlite TIMESYNC_AUTH_MODULES='["ldap","password"]' TIMESYNC_LDAP_URL=ldap://localhost:1389 TIMESYNC_LDAP_SEARCH_BASE=ou=passport-ldapauth PORT=8851 DEBUG=true mocha --harmony tests
scripts.test_pg: NODE_ENV=mocha knex migrate:latest && NODE_ENV=mocha TIMESYNC_AUTH_MODULES='["ldap","password"]' TIMESYNC_LDAP_URL=ldap://localhost:1389 TIMESYNC_LDAP_SEARCH_BASE=ou=passport-ldapauth PORT=8851 DEBUG=true mocha --harmony tests
scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=mocha_sqlite TIMESYNC_AUTH_MODULES='["ldap","password"]' TIMESYNC_LDAP_URL=ldap://localhost:1389 TIMESYNC_LDAP_SEARCH_BASE=ou=passport-ldapauth PORT=8851 DEBUG=true node --harmony ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover _mocha -- tests

author: OSU Open Source Lab <support@osuosl.org>
